title: not possible to edit a txt file after creating it on ie 8
body:
### expected behaviour
when you create a new txt file on owncloud using ie8, it should be possible to edit it

### actual behaviour
after creating the txt file, being this empty, by clicking on it, we access to the edit txt screen, but it is not possible to modify it.

### steps to reproduce
1. log in to oc
2. click on new > text file
3. give a name, test.txt
4. once it is created, click on test.txt
5. the file is open, but it is not possible to edit it.

### server configuration
web server:
acceptance testing, "version":"4.96.10","versionstring":"5.0 rc 2"
master_on_apache_with_sqlite


### client configuration
browser: ie8

operating system: windows 7
